channel.title: 🏢 CUHK on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 CUHK on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DAPE: Data-Adaptive Positional Encoding for Length Extrapolation
item.description: DAPE: A novel data-adaptive positional encoding method dynamically adjusts positional information based on input context, improving transformer performance and length generalization.
